summary: A young programmer whose job is to watch over the reality-warping Cube defies orders to rescue an innocent mother trapped in one of its rooms.
cast: Zachary Bennett|David Huband|Stephanie Moore|Martin Roach|Terri Hawkes|Richard McMillan|Mike 'Nug' Nahrgang|Tony Munch|Michael Riley|Joshua Peace|Diego Klattenhoff|Alexia Filippeos|Jasmin Geljo|Fernando Curcione|Flossie McKnight|Kyle McDonald|Sandi Ross|Dino Bellisario|Ashley James|Zero the Fish
keywords: cyberpunk|part of a trilogy|third part|underwater scene|room
title: Cube Zero
